outputs.output_descr: a) Realization of rights of vulnerable and marginalized groups enhanced

The budget has been revised to allocate funds, an amount of USD 763, 500, to cater for activities within the first six months of year 2007.

The apportionments are as follows:2KEN/04/220-00040281-Access to Rights Project, an amount of USD 140,000 has been allocated to cater for activities such as programme monitoring, capacity building for both CSO's and UNDP staffs, running the Projects, International Programme Officer's salary and the National UNV's allowances and contractual services.2KEN/05/225-Support to KHRC's Strategic Plan-00043058, an amonut of USD 75,000 has been allocated to cater for activities geared towards the support of KHRCs strategic plan, within the first months of 2007.2KEN/04/221-Putting Communities to Rights-00043059, an amount of USD 95,000 has been allocated to cater for activities such as, the training and graduation of paralegals, media strategy, within the first months of 2007.2KEN/05/220-Access to Justice-00043060, an amount of USD 140,000 has been allocated to cater for activities such as paralegal trainings, legal aid forums, small claims court agitation, within the first six months of 2007.2KEN/05/202 Action Aid poverty reduction-00045284, an amount of USD 95,000 has been allocated to cater for obligations under the project  within  the first six months of 2007.2KEN/05/203-Disabilities-00045516-an amount of USD 100,000 has been allocated to cater for activities within the first six months of year 2007.2KEN/05/229-Judicial Review-00047211, an amount of USD 50,000 has been allocated to cater for activities in year 2007.2KEN/06/205-Marginal Justices Project-0005186, an amount of USD 65,500 has been allocated to cater for activities, such as awareness creation workshops, lobbying and advocacy initiatives, in  year 2007.

project_descr: ACCESS TO RIGHTS AND JUSTICE FOR THE POOR AND MARGINALIZED GROUPS IN KENYA
